porcelain.nearby_monster: You may not enter the Porcelain now, there are monsters nearby
porcelain.nearby_porcelain: You may not enter the Porcelain here, another player's Porcelain is too close
wilderness.tooltip: The Wilderness is part of the world that is marked to be reset for future Minecraft updates. Anything built in The Wilderness may eventually be lost.
arena.tooltip: Arenas are zones where PvP is encouraged. Inside an Arena, Players will accumulate Harmony from fighting each other and drop their heads upon death. Arena K/D can be viewed at the World Hall.
world_hall.cannot_print_lore: You cannot print lore onto an item right now
world_hall.cannot_print_lore.tooltip: One level of experience is required to print lore onto an item
community:cannot_create_permit: You cannot create a Living Island Permit right now
community:cannot_create_permit.tooltip: A Charm and Paper are required to create a Living Island Permit
harmony.spores.haste.tooltip: Applies +10% Attack Speed and +20% Block Break Speed to all players
harmony.spores.leaping.tooltip: Applies +1 Safe Fall Distance and +0.1 Jump Strength to all players
harmony.spores.keeping.tooltip: Enables the Keep Inventory game rule
harmony.spores.regeneration.tooltip: Applies the Regeneration effect to all players
harmony.spores.resistance.tooltip: Applies the Resistance effect to all players
harmony.spores.fire_resistance.tooltip: Applies the Fire Resistance effect to all players
harmony.spores.water_breathing.tooltip: Applies the Water Breathing effect to all players
harmony.spores.night_vision.tooltip: Applies the Night Vision effect to all players
harmony.spores.strength.tooltip: Applies +3 Attack Damage to all players
harmony.spores.health.tooltip: Applies +4 Max Health to all players
harmony.spores.clear_weather.tooltip: Stops weather from changing and clears the skies
harmony.spores.horsepower.tooltip: Mounts receive Speed, Jump Boost, and Slow Falling effects while being ridden and receive the Levitation effect while looking upwards.
harmony.spores.disable_cramming.tooltip: Prevents entities from taking cramming damage
harmony.spores.disable_fall_damage.toolt: Prevents players from taking fall damage
recall.cannot_procure_whistle: You cannot procure a Recall Whistle right now
recall.cannot_procure_whistle_tooltip: A Netherite Ingot is required to procure a Recall Whistle
haberdasher.cannot_fill_head: You cannot paint a head right now
haberdasher.cannot_fill_head.tooltip: One level of experience and a player or mob head are needed to paint a head
painting.shroomhearth.founder.title: Founder
painting.shroomhearth.founder.author: epolixa
painting.shroomhearth.the_raft.title: The Raft
painting.shroomhearth.the_raft.author: _TheBman_
